workflows.name: Initialize Revenue Analytics
workflows.description: On page load, fetch initial revenue data from API and store in revenueData variable. Set loading state while fetching. Handle API errors with user feedback. Update last fetched timestamp.

default.animationKeyframes: @keyframes fadeIn { from { opacity: 0; transform: translateY(-10px); } to { opacity: 1; transform: translateY(0); } }
@keyframes fadeIn { from { opacity: 0; transform: translateY(20px); } to { opacity: 1; transform: translateY(0); } }

datasets.code:
return [{
  label: 'Daily Revenue',
  data: variables['a8e1a873-05aa-41c1-918d-ce9b87154aa9']?.dailyChart?.data || [],
  backgroundColor: '#3b82f6',
  borderRadius: 6,
  borderWidth: 0
}]

return [{
  label: 'Revenue',
  data: variables['a8e1a873-05aa-41c1-918d-ce9b87154aa9']?.timeChart?.data || [],
  borderColor: '#3b82f6',
  backgroundColor: 'rgba(59, 130, 246, 0.1)',
  tension: 0.4,
  fill: true
}]

return [{
  label: 'Revenue by Category',
  data: variables['a8e1a873-05aa-41c1-918d-ce9b87154aa9']?.categoryChart?.data || [],
  backgroundColor: [
    '#3b82f6',
    '#10b981',
    '#f97316',
    '#8b5cf6',
    '#ec4899',
    '#f59e0b'
  ],
  borderWidth: 2,
  borderColor: '#ffffff'
}]

default.animationKeyframes: @keyframes fadeIn { from { opacity: 0; transform: translateY(20px); } to { opacity: 1; transform: translateY(0); } }

interactions.name: Update Date Range

interactions.description: Set the selected period to daily

interactions.description: Set the active chart to category chart

interactions.description: Set the active chart to time chart

interactions.description: Set the active chart to daily chart

interactions.description: Filter the data by vehicle category
